about_the_game:
Is your game lacking some calming single-instrument tracks for emotional scenes? Then pick up the Simple Piano Music Pack! This pack’s 10 short BGM tracks focus entirely on pianos, giving it a unique style compared to the common orchestral and electronic music tunes often found in games. Give your villages a distinct sound compared to the bigger cities or the monster-infested dungeons, or fill your pubs with jaunty piano tunes that are being played by the local musician on the upright piano in the corner.

Each track comes in M4a and looping Ogg file formats, making it easy to add them right into your current MV/MZ project! Skip the bombastic soundtracks and give your relaxed game suitably chill piano BGM with the Simple Piano Music Pack!

Contents:

* 10 BGM songs royalty free
* m4a and ogg file formats included

Terms of Use:

This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
OK to be used in Commercial projects
Contents can be edited
OK for use in games with gore
OK for use in adult-rated games
